page.title: 19LIBRARIES IN CIPPENHAM
page.content: There are four local libraries in this area.Three of them are in schools.the other one is the main Cippenham Library situated at Elmshott Lane.It has been there since 1960.The hours are decided on by the County Council.The times the library is open are on Wed,Thurs and Sat, mornings,and Fri and Tues,all day. The library has members consisting of 4,213 adults,and 1,727 children.The library in total,has 21,000 books. The reference section,adult and children's are the three parts of Cippenham Library. The tickets cost 50p for children and Â£1.00 for adults.There are fines for overdue and damaged books. Cippenham Middle School has a fiction Library called the Susan Cooper Library because the famous author,who came to open it,went to the school.
